LCS2 Achievements

  • January 25, 2020
    Shravika Mittal had the honour of being invited for the Student’s Dinner 2020 with the Lieutenant Governor of Delhi.
  • December 24, 2019
    Tanmoy Chakraborty received Outstanding reviewer recognition in EMNLP-IJCNLP, 2019.
  • December 24, 2019
    Tanmoy Chakraborty received ASEM-DUO India Faculty Fellowship.
  • December 09, 2019
    Hridoy Sankar Dutta won third prize in the IDRBT Doctoral Colloquium 2019.
  • December 03, 2019
    Brihi Joshi got selected to attend the AAAI Undergraduate Consortium to be held at AAAI 2020 (acceptance rate - 16%) on 7th of February, 2020 in New York.
  • November 10, 2019
    Siva receives Prestigious ASEM DUO student fellowship 2019.
  • September 16, 2019
    Shivangi Shingal received best poster award in IEEE BigMM, 2019.
  • September 11, 2019
    LCS2 members received awards at IIIT Foundation Day 2019
    1. Brihi Joshi: Dean’s list of Academic Excellence
    2. Aditya Chetan: Dean’s list of Academic Excellence
    3. Viresh Gupta : Deans List for Academic Excellence & Deans List for Innovation in Research and Development
    4. Abhishek Maiti: Dean’s Innovation Research & Development
    5. Shravika Mittal: Dean’s List for Academic Excellence
    6. Vishal Raj Dutta: Best TA award for the IR course
    7. Baani Leen Kaur Jolly: Dean’s Innovation Research & Development
    8. Tanmoy Chakraborty: Teaching excellence award for NLP and IR courses.
  • September 10, 2019
    Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty received the prestigious IBM Faculty Award 2019. This award comprises of an unrestricted grant that can be used to strengthen the collaboration between IIITD and IBM Research.
  • August 30, 2019
    Sarthika Dhawan’s work on Detecting Collusion in E-Commerce Sites selected as Best BTech Thesis award in CSE 2019.
  • August 08, 2019
    Siva Charan Reddy and Shivangi Singhal got selected for the prestigious TCS fellowship.
  • August 05, 2019
    Shravika Mittal, 4th year UG student has been awarded the Google Women Techmakers Scholarship, 2019.
  • July 21, 2019
    Dattatreya Mohapatra, a undergrad batch of 2019 alumni has been granted full assistance to attend and volunteer at CppCon 2019. This is the premier conference for the entire C++ community and is organized by the Standard C++ Foundation.
  • July 14, 2019
    Brihi Joshi has received the best poster award for the work done on Collusive Retweeter Detection with Tanmoy Chakraborty, Hridoy Sankar Dutta and Aditya Chetan at the AI Assisted Data Analytics (AIAD) workshop held at IIIT Delhi.
  • July 01, 2019
    Sarthika Dhawan received ACM-W fellowship, Microsoft IJCAI and INAE travel grant to present her paper in IJCAI’19.
  • June 30, 2019
    Brihi Joshi won the Judge’s Choice Best Poster Award for the work done on Collusive Retweeter Detection with Tanmoy Chakraborty, Hridoy Sankar Dutta and Aditya Chetan at the Research AI Day held at IIM Bangalore and co-organised by IBM India Research Lab. This work on Collusion detection on Twitter fit extremely well with the theme of Research AI Day - “Usable AI”.
  • June 27, 2019
    LCS2 PhD students are heading abroad for their internship.
    • Hridoy Sankar Dutta is joining Dr. Hemant Purohit's lab at George Mason University - Fairfax, Virginia.
    • Siva Charan Reddy is joining Dr. Deepak Padmanabhan's lab at Queen's University, Belfast.
  • June 05, 2019
    Best student paper award in JCDL: Go Wide, Go Deep: Quantifying the Impact of Scientific Papers through Influence Dispersion Trees has received “Best Student paper” award in the Joint Conference on Digital Libraries (JCDL) 2019.
  • March 13, 2019
    1. Aditya Chetan has received a visiting opportunity at the Max Planck Institute for Informatics, Saarbrücken. He will be working in Department 5 (D5) - Databases and Information Systems in the broad areas of NLP and Data Mining.
    2. Brihi Joshi has received the Snap Research Scholarship 2019. She has been awarded a scholarship as well as an internship opportunity at Snap Inc. Research, LA. She’s one of the 8 scholars selected globally and the only one from India! Further details
  • January 09, 2019
    Brihi Joshi has been awarded an ACM-W scholarship to attend WSDM 2019.
  • November 28, 2018
    Aditya Chetan receives travel grant from Google to attend WSDM 2019.
  • November 21, 2018
    Hridoy Sankar Dutta receives student travel grant to attend CoDS-COMAD 2019.
  • October 20, 2018
    LCS2 Member Lavina Jain has been given a Software Engineering internship opportunity with Facebook London for Summers 2019.
  • September 21, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy receives “Google India Faculty Award” (Domain: Data Mining and Modeling).
  • September 20, 2018
    Brihi Joshi, 3rd year UG student and an LCS2 member has been awarded the Google Women Techmakers Scholarship, 2018. It contains a $1000 award and a retreat to the Singapore office of Google, all expenses paid.
  • September 12, 2018
    Hridoy Sankar Dutta has been selected to attend the Young Scientists’ Conference at India International Science Festival 2018, Lucknow where he will be presenting a poster on his work on Collusion in Online Social Networks.
  • September 12, 2018
    Brihi Joshi has been awarded a scholarship to attend the Grace Hopper Celebration India, 2018. It is produced by AnitaB.org India and presented in partnership with ACM India.
  • September 12, 2018
    Brihi Joshi, 3rd year UG student and an LCS2 member has been awarded the Google Women Techmakers Scholarship, 2018. It contains a $1000 award and a retreat to the Singapore office of Google, all expenses paid.
  • September 08, 2018
    LCS2 members received several awards for their achievements at the 10th Foundation Day celebration of IIIT Delhi.
    Dean’s List of Academic Affairs: Dattatreya Mohapatra, Vishal Raj Dutta, Pulkit Madaan, Viresh Gupta, Sarthika Dhawan
    Dean’s List of Student Affairs: Lavina Jain, Baani Leen Kaur Jolly
    Dean’s Award for Innovation, Research and Development: Brihi Joshi, Aditya Chetan
    Teaching Awards: Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty (Both Monsoon 2017 and Winter 2018)
  • September 01, 2018
    LCS2 member Brihi Joshi was recently acknowledged by the Women Who Code weekly newsletter - CODE Review, for her contribution in her first academic paper that was accepted at ASONAM 2018.
  • July 30, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy has received an “unconstrained faculty award” from Financials Markets Technology start-up Egregore Labs.
  • July 10, 2018
    Our group intern Pranay Mukherjee becomes one of the contributors of NLTK. He introduced a new distance metric Jaro Winkler distance to the NLTK package. His contribution is listed as an awesome contribution by NLTK maintainers. PR Link
  • June 19, 2018
    Shivangi Singhal, a PhD student of Dr. Rajiv Ratn Shah and Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty, has got selected for attending the ACM India Grad Cohort 2018. Only 50 students were selected for this event. https://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~acmindiacohort/
  • May 18, 2018
    Ayush Agarwal received PAKDD Student Travel Award. Only 10 students have been awarded the same.
  • May 04, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy received Early Career Research Award
  • April 28, 2018
    Dr. Tanmoy received best reviewer award at WWW’18

Laboratory for Computation Social Systems (LCS2) at Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi (IIIT-Delhi)
